root: ^Elder Oozy, What happened? Why are you in this condition?

main: ^Yes, I have, But that's not important right now. Please tell me who did this to you,
^Zombies! They have taken over the island.
^Zombies!? But how? We are slime. How can we get infected and become one?
^I do not know that, My Child; we’ve been running from them for half a year. We don’t know how this happened or why this is happening.
^I don’t know My Child; I’m the only survivor from the group I was with, And I don't know how much time I have left.
^Please don’t say stuff like that; I’m going to save you.
